Package me.agno.gridjavacore

Class Grid<T>

java.lang.Object
me.agno.gridjavacore.Grid<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of items in the grid
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGrid<T>, IGridOptions
public class Grid<T> extends Object implements IGrid<T>
Represents a grid that displays and manages a collection of items of type T. The grid provides functionality for filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination.

  • Constructor Details

    • Grid

      public Grid(jakarta.persistence.EntityManager entityManager, Class<T> targetType, LinkedHashMap<String,List<String>> query, IColumnBuilder<T> columnBuilder)
      Constructs a Grid object.
      Parameters:
      entityManager - the entity manager used for querying the database
      targetType - the class representing the entity type for the grid
      query - the query parameters for filtering, sorting, and searching the grid data
      columnBuilder - the column builder used for defining the grid columns (optional, if null a default column builder will be used)

    • autoGenerateColumns

      public void autoGenerateColumns()
      Automatically generates columns for the grid based on the annotations present in the target type. Each field annotated with the GridColumn annotation will be added as a column to the grid. If the annotation's key attribute is set to true, the column will be marked as a primary key column.
      Specified by:
      autoGenerateColumns in interface IGrid<T>

    • getTotals

      public TotalsDTO getTotals()
      Retrieves the totals for the grid.
      Specified by:
      getTotals in interface IGrid<T>
      Returns:
      the TotalsDTO object containing the sum, average, max, min, and calculations for each column

    • isDefaultSortEnabled

      public boolean isDefaultSortEnabled()
      Determines whether the default sort is enabled in the grid. If the default sort is enabled, the grid will apply a predefined sorting order to the data.
      Specified by:
      isDefaultSortEnabled in interface IGrid<T>
      Returns:
      true if the default sort is enabled, false otherwise

    • setDefaultSortEnabled

      public void setDefaultSortEnabled(boolean value)
      Sets whether the default sort is enabled in the grid. If the default sort is enabled, the grid will apply a predefined sorting order to the data.
      Specified by:
      setDefaultSortEnabled in interface IGrid<T>
      Parameters:
      value - true to enable the default sort, false to disable it
